description: LifecycleScope coroutine outlives lifecycle owner, causing crashes or memory leaks. Lifecycle-coroutine binding broken.
commonCauses: Using Activity lifecycleScope in Service or Application
Fragment using Activity lifecycle instead of viewLifecycle
Lifecycle owner leaked preventing scope cancellation
Custom lifecycle implementation not cancelling scope
Using wrong lifecycle owner for operation
solutions: Use correct lifecycle owner for scope
Use lifecycle-appropriate scope for work duration
Verify scope cancellation on lifecycle destroy
prevention: Use viewLifecycleOwner in Fragments for view work
Use Activity/Fragment lifecycle only for component work
Test with LeakCanary for lifecycle leaks
Use proper lifecycle scope for each component type
Test configuration changes and back navigation
Monitor lifecycle state in debug builds
